title: Unable to fast sync kovan network
body:
**Describe the bug**

Nethermind is reporting it is unable to sync Kovan.

**To Reproduce**

Start nethermind using systemd w/ command:
```
ExecStart=/.../nethermind/Nethermind.Runner \
          --datadir /.../nethermind/data \
          --Init.WebSocketsEnabled true \
          --JsonRpc.WebSocketsPort 8546 \
          --JsonRpc.EnabledModules ["net","admin","txpool","trace","debug","eth","subscribe"]

```
and config:
```
NETHERMIND_CONFIG="kovan"
...
```
Verify node is running:
```
ubuntu@<HOST>/:/<Path>/nethermind$ sudo systemctl restart nethermind.service
ubuntu@<HOST>/:/<Path>/nethermind$ journalctl -u nethermind.service -f
-- Logs begin at Wed 2021-12-08 18:08:46 UTC. --

```

Wait for sync peers:
```
Jan 27 20:03:24 nethermind-42-a-stage Nethermind.Runner[10824]: 2022-01-27 20:03:24.1127|Peers | with known best block: 49 | all: 49 |
Jan 27 20:03:24 nethermind-42-a-stage Nethermind.Runner[10824]: 2022-01-27 20:03:24.1127|Downloaded 24393062 / 29505131 | current   510.06bps | total   294.46bps
Jan 27 20:03:24 nethermind-42-a-stage Nethermind.Runner[10824]: 2022-01-27 20:03:24.1127|Sync peers 49(49)/50
```

Run for multiple days check sync status
```
nethermind> eth.syncing()
Request complete in 13715.393Œºs
{
  "startingBlock": "0x0",
  "currentBlock": "0x0",
  "highestBlock": "0x173fe83"
}
```

**Expected behavior**
```
nethermind> eth.syncing()
Request complete in 13715.393Œºs
{
  "startingBlock": "0x0",
  "currentBlock": "0x173fe83",
  "highestBlock": "0x173fe83"
}
```

**Desktop (please complete the following information):**
 OS: Linux Ubuntu

**Additional context**
Running a few mainnet and xdai nodes that are sync'ed and behaving well.
Hey @LukaszRozmej , just wanted to bump this when you get a chance üëç

@dmarzzz sorry, it should already be fine, our config wasn't updated. Will be in next release, but you can just grab newest config from here and do fresh sync: https://github.com/NethermindEth/nethermind/blob/master/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Runner/configs/kovan.cfg
